pr_title: Add MetricProducer for OpenTelemetry metrics SDK

timeline.message:
Add MetricProducer for OpenTelemetry metrics SDK

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Cristian Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: this name feels weird to me in the context of the rest of the naming in the SDK. How about SdkMetricProducer or MetricProducerSdk to match the naming patterns everywhere else?
timeline.author: jkwatson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@

+
+package io.opentelemetry.sdk.metrics.export;
+
+import io.opentelemetry.sdk.metrics.MeterSdkProvider;
+import io.opentelemetry.sdk.metrics.data.MetricData;
+import java.util.Collection;
+
+/** A {@link MetricProducer} that can read metrics from an instance of {@link MeterSdkProvider}. */
+public final class OpenTelemetryMetricProducer implements MetricProducer {

replies.bodyText: Tried a different design, what do you think?
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I like the one-stop-shop approach. Let's go with the new design and see how it feels in the "real world" over the next week or so.  👍
replies.author: jkwatson
